entity.description: In a data map, maps ownership data from the source file to Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the owner mapping was created.

attributes.name: targetuservalueforsourcecrmuserlink
attributes.description: Microsoft Dynamics CRM user.

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Reason for the status of the owner mapping.

constrainedList.name: ownermapping_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the owner mapping.

attributes.name: importmapid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data map with which the owner mapping is associated.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the lookup mapping.

attributes.name: ownermappingid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the owner mapping.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the owner mapping.

attributes.name: processcode
attributes.description: Code that indicates whether the owner mapping has to be processed

constrainedList.name: ownermapping_processcode
constrainedList.description: Code that indicates whether the owner mapping has to be processed

attributes.name: sourcesystemusername
attributes.description: Source user name that has to be replaced

attributes.name: targetsystemuserid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the Microsoft Dynamics 365 user.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Status of the owner mapping.

attributes.name: sourceuservalueforsourcecrmuserlink
attributes.description: Source user value for source Microsoft Dynamics 365 user link.

attributes.name: targetsystemuserdomainname
attributes.description: Microsoft Dynamics 365 logon name with which the source user name should be replaced.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the owner mapping was last modified.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the ownermapping.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the ownermapping.

attributes.name: solutionid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

attributes.name: componentstate
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: overwritetime
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: ismanaged
attributes.description: Information that specifies whether this component is managed.

attributes.name: introducedversion
attributes.description: Version in which the component is introduced.

attributes.name: ownermappingidunique
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the OwnerMapping.
